name: Shifter (Nerdig Freak)
description:
The game talks about the re appearance of the Shifter race after the last one of them was imprisoned and held captive for centuries, now that the last guardian is free your mission is to reclaim the land that the "Tharwons" have occupied.

Controls :
W,A,S,D : movement
mouse : look around 

Space : Jump
Right click  : use the special ability

E : interact with environment

1,2,3,4 : Change between shift States 

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Shift States :

State 1  abilities  :

  • Blink : u can teleport to a point in a radius around the player 

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

State 2 abilities : 
 

  • Outline :  inside blind areas you can see the outline of the environment around you 

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Environment element :

  • Blindness Portal : when  you enter past this portal you will not be able to see anything around you, you can see inside the blindness area using your 2nd state ability 

 

  •  Soul crystal : approaching this crystal will save your progress and will also be the position of your re-spawn point 
  • Door Locks:  Room doors are mostly closed when you find the keys in the map insert it inside the Door lock to open them (during the beta test the Keys are not included in the map yet so you can just approach it and interact with it)
  • Shield Spawner : when you interact with it it will spawn a shielding wall in front of it and will block any attack from enemies/vision
